verses.roman:
eka-dina mahāprabhu kariyāchena śayana
kṛṣṇa rāsa-līlā kare,--dekhilā svapana

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kariyāchena śayana—was taking rest; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; rāsa-līlā kare—performs rāsa-līlā dance; dekhilā—He saw; svapana—a dream.
translation: One day while He was resting, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu dreamed He saw Kṛṣṇa performing His rāsa dance.
